details.description:
Myspace Exclusive! Beautiful apartment in Williamsburg, prime location!
This 2 bedroom apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You?ll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby?s All Right, Patrizia?s, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Only # blocks from the L train, and a # minute walk to the JMZ trains
June 1 move in Small pets welcome No broker fee

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors

details.description:
Myspace Exclusive!
One bedroom with separate living room and kitchen in 1920s elevator prewar with live-in super.
- Queen sized bedroom - Big living room space - Tons of light, exposed brick, updated modern bathroom, kingsize bedrooms; plenty of space for entertaining.
Fabulous location just steps from Montrose L / Flushing JMZ trains and surrounded by tons of great bars, restaurants; shopping. Short commute to Manhattan!
June 1 move in No broker fee Heat; hot water included Small pets welcome

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances

details.description:
Myspace Exclusive!
1 bedroom layout with extra office! Stainless steel appliances, eat in kitchen. Nice layout!
The building is an extremely well-maintained 1920s prewar featuring stainless appliances, hardwood floors, tons of sunlight, high ceilings and lots of space. Pet friendly, heat; hot water included!
Call today, as this listing will not last.
June 1st move in Small pets OK No broker fee

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances

details.description:
Virtual tour available!
Reside in a gorgeous 1 bed / 1 bath apartment with stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, natural sunlight, modern features, and easy access to trains. To live in Crown Heights is to live in convenience and a diverse community. Enjoy the luxury of having access to most train lines like the 2,3,4,5 and C, or switch to any letter train at Atlantic terminal. Enjoy a short walk to Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, and Botanic Garden. Crown Heights offers a number of local restaurants and bars like Chavela's, Dutch Boy, Cent'Anni, Drink Lounge, 99 Rogers, Mayfield, Cafe Rue Dix, Glady's and more! Easy commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.
Available May 17th Broker fee applies SMALL pets OK

Sunny 2 bed / 1 bath attached a now renovated 140yo church which has been converted into luxury apartments and sunday school
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath with beautiful tile work and granite countertops. Floor to ceiling windows Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms Queen Sized bedrooms Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closet if needed
Building features: ButterflyMX intercom Latch bluetooth lock system Multiple laundry rooms Garage Parking ($250-300/mo) Huge Roof deck Zipcars available Bike storage Go Lockers for shipping and receiving packages securely State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of cool local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train. Pets ok No fee $20 app fee Call or text to view the right away.

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors, Central A/C
A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Intercom system, Central A/C, Roof Access

details.description:
77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Central A/C

details.description:
Prime Crown Heights Living at 1499 Bedford Ave!
Discover the epitome of modern living at 1499 Bedford Ave, a new building in the heart of Crown Heights. Located steps from Eastern Parkway and multiple subway lines, and within walking distance of Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park, this residence offers unparalleled convenience and vibrant city life.
Building Amenities:
State-of-the-art fitness room Pet wash station Laundry facilities (in-unit laundry in some units) Social lounge with game room Furnished rooftop with panoramic city views Second-floor public terrace Open workstations Dedicated mail room
Unit Features: Private terraces and balconies in select units Kitchen islands in select units Large windows with abundant natural light Stunning views of NYC skyline, Prospect Park, and neighborhood streets
Welcome to 1499 Bedford Ave?where luxury, community, and convenience meet. Experience the best of Crown Heights living.

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace

details.description:
This building is arguably THE MOST desirable neighborhood in Brooklyn. Right on the Williamsburg Waterfront with gorgeous river and city views, all the restaurants, coffee shops, bars, art and music venues, plant shops, parks, farmers markets, grocers, and absolutely anything and everything else you could desire right outside your door. Be warned: the luxury experience you are offered inside the building may leave you feeling torn about whether to go out and enjoy the bustle of the neighborhood or stay in and enjoy your own amenities right here at home!Conveniently located off the J. M, and L trains, as well as the B32, B62, and Q59 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher Central A/C and Heat Private Balcony Excellent light from extra large windows
BUILDING FEATURES: Bike Room Courtyard Elevator Fitness Center Laundry Room Tenant Lounge Package Room Finished Roof Deck First; Security NO FEE

details.description:
BRAND NEW LUXURY BUILDING in the beautiful Vinegar Hill area of DUMBO!! Enjoy unbelievable views across both the Manhattan Bridge and Brooklyn Bridge. Visit the countless parks nearby such as John St Park, Main St Park, Trinity Park, Brooklyn Bridge Park, Cadman Plaza Park, Whitman Park and even more! Become a patron of some of the long standing and delicious LOCAL local restaurants such as Bridge Coffee and still enjoy those late night cravings spots we pretend we don't know and love (*cough Shake Shack) just a few blocks further. Take a little old school Brooklyn, mix in some new luxury living, and that's how you'll end up falling in love with your new home here!
Conveniently located off the A, C and F trains as well as the B57, B62, B69 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher; Microwave Central A/C; Heat Inquire for Private Balconies! Inquire for IN UNIT laundry!
BUILDING FEATURES: Courtyard Roof Deck Elevator Laundry Room Fitness Center Rec Room Tenant Lounge Package Room Bike Storage Pets Allowed
First; Security NO BROKER FEE

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Central A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space, Washer/Dryer In Unit

Easily practice safe social distancing with your own?Private. Unobstructed. Views. Of Manhattan. Built-in 2019, You?ll enjoy a generously-spaced 3-bed option, in the beautiful neighborhood of Astoria, yeah, green space and good bites, for days!
You?ll enjoy a super sun-lit 3 bedroom unit that can each room comfortably fit a queen-sized bed, dresser, tall wardrobe, make it your studio or even home gym or playroom for a little-one.
Make dinner without, having to clear your workspace all the time, and having a pet to help keep you company! After dinner, take a stroll through the neighborhood and check out everything.
Lucky for you you?re nestled on a residential block, close to shops, stores, and Transportation options are the N/Q at Broadway, and R/M at Steinway, an estimated 20 min. to Midtown? for those who commute.

details.description: Virtual tours available!Do not miss out on this 2 bed / 1 bath apartment in Brooklyn's up and coming neighborhood Prospect Lefferts Gardens! People forget that Brooklyn is the biggest borough and offers some of the best, historic architecture. Enjoy the neighborhood's easy access to the B,Q,2,3 lines, a number of bus lines, and short walk to Prospect Park. Live within steps to juice bars, grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, bars, pharmacies, banks, local bakeries, and more to explore. Brooklyn Greenery, MIdwood Flats, Irv's, Bluebird, Blessings, and Food Sermon are just a couple of the many options to check out in this vibrant neighborhood.Easy commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

details.description:
Artists, musicians, entertainers DREAM SPACE! 1900 square feet! Absolutely MASSIVE loft apartment in Greenpoint, just one block from McGolrick Park! Beautiful raw style loft space with exposed brick, high ceilings, and large windows.
TRUE LOFT LIVING!
This space has 1 bedroom built + an office space. The rest is an incredible wide-open layout. LG washer and dryer in the unit, along with central AC.
Excellent location in Greenpoint, Brooklyn. McGorlic Park, Kingsland Bar; Grill across the street, Caf? Grumpy, Goldie?s Bar, G train nearby. And much much more.
No broker fee Pets OK Available 6/1

Ultimate luxury living in this converted historic landmarked movie theater in Ridgewood!
2 bedroom, 1 full bath. Fully equipped building featuring a gym, elevator, laundry room, pet spa, business conference center, and kid?s room. Fully furnished patio with bbq and hammocks, and roof deck with skyline views.
The apartments have central AC, dishwashers, and plenty of storage. Top of the line appliances and finishes.
Truly breathtaking building.

details.description: Renovated to perfection, this massive 2-bedroom apartment in prime Williamsburg offers modern convenience and style. Enjoy the luxury of in-unit laundry, split-unit AC/heat, and a separate kitchen for culinary adventures. With a spacious living room, ample closet space, and large bedrooms, this renovated gem is a must-see in a prime location. Don't miss out!

amenities.other: Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
Carroll Gardens is an old-school Brooklyn brownstone paradise. The neighborhood is known for its generations old, authentic family run, red-sauce Italian joints that now sit next to upscale yoga studios, one of a kind boutiques, and fro-yo shops. This beautiful sector off the Buttermilk Channel is known as the Columbia Street Waterfront. You will have bragging rights of finding a true NYC gem where you'll end up knowing your neighbors, your barber, and your butcher by name. And you won't ever want to leave :)Conveniently located off the F and G trains as well as the B57 and B61 bus routes.BRAND NEW EVERYTHINGThat's right! This unit is getting a full makeover!Stainless steel kitchenDishwasher and microwaveCentral a/c and heatAmazing natural light!!
Photos here of a similar unit post -renovations Pet Friendly First; Security NO FEE!

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Central A/C, Hardwood Floors

details.description:
Born in 1916, the building?s common areas were restored in 2018 to Architectural Digest worthy specs. A hand-carved door, deeply grained wainscoting, and a 1962 Danish chandelier greets you at the entrance. The apartment itself has been loved by its occupants and remains in triple mint condition. Elements of Bushwick?s industrial past such as exposed central air ductwork, and exposed bricks are married with traditional townhouse elements in the decorative fireplace and elegant proportions. Featuring a Washer; Dryer, NEST smart thermostat, professional property management, and perhaps the best location in Bushwick on the cusp of Ridgewood. 1.5 blocks from the Jefferson L and everything else you could want in a neighborhood. Welcome to your new home.
Cats ok, no dogs, sorry.

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors, Dishwasher, Central A/C, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Skylight, Fireplace

details.description:
It sounds like you've found an incredible space in Gowanus! This large 2-bedroom duplex w/ basement with a back deck. Let's dive into the details:
This duplex boasts two levels of spacious living:
Upstairs, you'll find two well-appointed bedrooms, each with its own closet, alongside an open kitchen/living area and a full bathroom. Downstairs, the large basement offers two additional rooms and a convenient half bath, along with the added bonus of a back deck! The apartment is equipped with central A/C and heat, a dishwasher, and shared laundry facilities for added convenience.
Nestled between 3rd and 4th Aves in Gowanus, the location couldn't be more convenient. Just steps from the Union Street R station, with easy access to Atlantic Ave-Barclays (2/3/4/5/B/D/N/Q/R) and Bergen; Carroll St (F/G) stations, commuting is a breeze. Plus, you'll have a wealth of shops, restaurants, and bars right at your doorstep.
This duplex offers the perfect blend of space, comfort, and convenience. Don't miss out?schedule a viewing today!
